com.madrobot.ui.widgets

Class PageCurlView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.madrobot.ui.widgets.PageCurlView

  • public class PageCurlView
extends View
    A view that curls the end of the page. The curled end can be flipped like the iBooks app.

    Page can be flipped by double tap as well
    Usage 

            <com.madrobot.ui.widgets.PageCurlView
                android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                android:layout_height="fill_parent"
                android:id="@+id/dcgpagecurlPageCurlView1"
                <!--Bitmap to be used for the top drawable -->
                android:top_Drawable="@drawable/topDraw"
                <!--Bitmap to be used for the bottom drawable -->
                android:top_Drawable="@drawable/bottomDraw"
                android:background="@drawable/page1/>

    Demo

    • Field Detail

      • CURLMODE_SIMPLE

        public static final int CURLMODE_SIMPLE
        Simple curl mode. Curl target will move only in one axis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CURLMODE_DYNAMIC

        public static final int CURLMODE_DYNAMIC
        Dynamic curl mode. Curl target will move on both X and Y axis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SetCurlMode

        public void SetCurlMode(int curlMode)
        Set the curl mode.

        Can be one of the following values:

        Value Description
        com.dcg.pagecurl:CURLMODE_SIMPLE Curl target will move only in one axis.
        com.dcg.pagecurl:CURLMODE_DYNAMIC Curl target will move on both X and Y axis.
        Parameters:
        curlMode -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if curlMode is invalid
        See Also:
        CURLMODE_SIMPLE, CURLMODE_DYNAMIC

      • GetCurlMode

        public int GetCurlMode()
        Return an integer that represents the current curl mode.

        Can be one of the following values:

        Value Description
        com.dcg.pagecurl:CURLMODE_SIMPLE Curl target will move only in one axis.
        com.dcg.pagecurl:CURLMODE_DYNAMIC Curl target will move on both X and Y axis.
        Returns:
        int - current curl mode
        See Also:
        CURLMODE_SIMPLE, CURLMODE_DYNAMIC
